original_title: BET Comic View All Stars Vol 3
overview: Seasoned comedian Don "D.C." Curry hosts this third volume of unfiltered laughs from BET's long-running "Comic View" series, a televised stand-up showcase featuring some of the hottest urban comics on the U.S. circuit. Featured comedians in this installment include D.L. Hughley, George Willborn, Montana Taylor and Earthquake.
title: BET Comic View All Stars Vol 3
